name: lonleydragon
description:
Theme - Minimalism, I decided that I would use minimalism is most aspects of my game, simple gameplay simple art and assets, mainly the last two as I'm not so good at them x3.

Challenges-

"Alone" - I decided that alone would be the stories focus as you play as a lonely dragon trying to find their/ a friend.

"You are the enemy" and "Everything is dangerous" - I came up with an idea that involved combining the last two challenges as you are your own enemy in this game, anything you touch bursts into flames, and everything is dangerous as by setting things alight you also reduce your score!

Hope you enjoy my small little game about a lonely dragon,

will your dragon find a friend?
